notes: We have committed to deliver 1000 dry ration kits in the Vasant Kunj area. We successfully delivered 104 kits that can sustain 104 families during the pandemic. The second phase of our commitment reached and helped another 133 families.

event: 104 kits to the waste pickers community in Vasant Kunj
notes: Waste pickers live a hard life but do an important task, willing to dig through other people's waste to take out what is reusable, recyclable, and repairable. Our goal is to reach out to 1,000 families in the waste picker community and help them sustain during the pandemic, and we're very excited to share that we've distributed Karuna 2020 Dry Ration Packs to 104 families.

event: 1,000 kits delivered in Vasant Kunj to waste pickers
notes:
It is hard to imagine our lives without waste pickers. While their contribution to our society is essentially indispensable. Yet, in this tough time amidst the pandemic, they're one of the worst affected groups. 

Karuna 2020 committed to deliver 1000 kits to the waste picker community in Vasant Kunj that could sustain almost 4000 people for a month. 

The lights are dim but they dare to shine. We dare to stand by our brothers in these dark hours and dare to hope. 

Together, we shall overcome.
A set of migrant families in DLF phase 3 reached out to us, we connected directly to the beneficiaries. They collected all information and ids and ensured orderly distribution.

People living in slums and villages face hunger, arising from loss of wage and lack of resources to stock food supplies. With the help of our committed volunteers, we were able to deliver 95 more kits to the slums near Vasant Kunj, South Delhi.

event: Supporting our frontline workers while providing for the community
notes:
This unusual time has imposed numerous constraints on the society. We can't go out, can't have social gathering, can't work, can't eat.

But there is group of heroes out there, on ground. This group is busy making sure that the order is maintained. These heroes include the Police, the waste pickers, the municipal employees, the doctors and other support staff. 

Thanks to Anurag Kashyap, the founder of Shakti Foundation and Gulmeher, we creatively managed to hit two targets with one arrow. 

Anurag's idea was to employ daily wagers to make masks and pay them 3 to 5 Rupees per piece. A worker can easily produce 80-100 masks a day and ends up earning 300-500 INR/day.

We synchronized with the local police and other government authorities to estimate the demand for these masks and other PPE. 
With God's grace, Anurag's timely idea and your support, we are on track to produce 10000 masks. Out of this, 6000 have already been distributed. Stay tuned for the details!

You sharing our progress with your friends and family makes a huge difference.

Thanks 
Karuna 2020 Volunteers

- Help Your Level 1 helpers - Maids/ Car Cleaners/ Etc
- Cost of one kit
- Cost to us in bulk

event: 2 kits delivered to the elderly in DLF Phase 3
notes: "Every effort counts, no matter how small, if it moves you closer to your goal." With your help, we distributed two kits to the elderly in DLF Phase 3, Gurugram, Haryana, yesterday.
With the help of Shakti Foundation, our on-ground distribution partner, we successfully served 132 more families in the waste picker community in Vasant Kunj. Thanks for your generous support.

Karuna 2020 now has five mask manufacturing locations, where we're making thousands of free masks to help keep the police, medical workers, essential service providers, and their families safe. Every day, our volunteers work in our facilities in New Delhi, Dehradun, Tehri, Bahadurgarh, and Bharatpur to make masks so we help those on the frontlines. Help us manufacture more masks and provide dry ration by donating at https://karuna2020.org/donate.

Our brave volunteers and partners are on the ground, verifying information and distributing Karuna 2020 Dry Ration Packs around the city. Our friends at the women's collective Gulmeher have started producing masks to help keep them safe. Our goal is to manufacture 1,000 masks every day.
Estimate costs/ impact and learning from the first sprint

event: 1,000 masks distributed to police in Tehri
notes: During the lockdown, the police, medical workers, and essential service providers are on the frontlines to make sure we stay safe. With your support, we distributed 1,000 masks to the Anjanisain Police Station, District Tehri, Uttarakhand, to help keep police personnel and their families safe.
Whats the status from Ramvir ji's end?

With your support and backing, we successfully completed the distribution of 12 Karuna 2020 Dry Ration Packs, bringing our total up to 82 familities.

A 12 year old girl reached out to us and helped prepare a list of beneficiaries in her community. She also introduced us to other members in her family and facilitated the distribution. Over the next week, we plan to distribute 1000 such kits.

In our biggest outreach yet, 500 kits were distributed in Gulmeher, a women's collective of waste pickers turned artisans supported by Shakti Foundation. Around 2,000 people will benefit from these kits. This endevour would not have been possible without our generous donors, untiring ground support and all those who made it happen.

event: 65 kits in Maidan Garhi with the help of local SHO
notes: The livelihoods of a large number of families surviving on daily wages have been shaken up, as the crisis around the COVID-19 pandemic grows. With the help of the Local SHO, we were able to deliver 65 kits in Maidan Garhi, a residential area in South Delhi.
One of our volunteers personally identified a group of beneficiaries who lost access to ration as a repercussion of the pandemic. The kits delivered to them brought relief.

event: 1000 Cotton Masks Delivered in Saket Area with the help of local SHO
notes: With the help and support of the local SHO of Saket Area, we successfully distributed 1000 cotton masks to the needy to control the spread of the virus.

event: 9 kits delivered to Basai Dara Pur
notes:
Sonu, one of our volunteer's driver, has been working on the ground and helping his community during the pandemic. He approached us with a list of nine familities who need our help, and single-handedly arranged the logistics and on-ground support for the distribution.

We distributed 9 Karuna 2020 Dry Ration kits to his community in Basai Dara Pur, West Delhi.

event: 5000 Cotton Masks delivered to EDMC workers
notes:
Having successfully delivered over 2500 kits, Karuna 2020 in partnership with Shakti Foundation is working towards ensuring safety of people who serve the community invisibly - i.e. the municipality workers. 

We have distributed 5000 masks to East Delhi Municipal Corporation and have committed to donate 5000 more, making it a total of 10000.

The livelihoods of a large number of families surviving on daily wages have been shaken up, as the crisis around the COVID-19 pandemic grows. One of our volunteers identified a group of vulnerable beneficiaries and delivered 15 kits to them.

event: Sarpanch's family distributes 30 kits in Sarhaul
notes: The Sarpanch's family in Sarhaul contributed the entire cost of 30 kits to us, and took over the distribution and logistical responsibility for their community. On April 5, Karuna 2020 Dry Ration Packs were distributed to 30 families in Sarhaul, Gurugram, Haryana.
One of our volunteers identified 61 families in a Gurgaon slum, affected by the pandemic. The ration kits served as a relief.

If you've been wanting to contribute but couldn't get around to the NEFT/RTGS process, we now support donations over UPI. Once youâ€™ve made a donation, please fill the Donor Details Form available on our website so we can verify your donation and issue an 80G tax deduction receipt.

Use the VPA SHAKTI.41215081@hdfcbank or find our QR code on https://karuna2020.org/donate/, and scan it using any UPI-supported payments app, like Paytm, PhonePe, Google Pay, and BHIM.

The lights are dim, but hopes high.
Resources slim, but help nearby.

We have lost brothers and sisters, still without a cure.
Shut off in our homes, our only option is to endure.

Stand with your family, your friends, spread hope.
Pray for others, who might not be able to cope. 

Help your helpers, your city, your world.
Even if it's just modest sums.

Stay at home, the sun will rise.
Together, we shall overcome.

---

After having served our community and those in need, after having realized our privilege, we as a team have resorted to this message of hope, that, together, we shall overcome. 

All our efforts and communications going forward will try and follow this core principle.

We have committed to deliver 1000 dry ration kits in the Vasant Kunj area. We successfully delivered 237 dry ration kits. The third phase of our commitment reached and helped another 100 families affected by the pandemic.
The Rajiv Gandhi Foundation generously donated 300 dry ration kits to those affected via the pandemic. We extend our gratitude to them for aiding this noble initiative.

event: 70 kits distributed by an anonymous executive
notes: An anonymous executive sponsored 70 kit and managed the distribution on ground level personally.

event: 30000 masks to be produced in partnership with Haryana Skill Development Mission
notes:
The HSDM has donated cloth and wages totaling 180000 INR to produce and deliver 30000 masks. The masks will be produced at a location in Bahadurgarh, and social distancing measures will be followed stringently. 

These masks will be donated to front-line workers, i.e. cleaners, police, and other service providers. The production has started and we hope to ramp up capacity in the weeks to come.

event: 12 kits delivered to an old set of beneficiaries
notes: They reached out to us a month ago and then again yesterday. Kripa arranged the transport and delivery. This doesn't need a social post but can be updated on the website.
